title: Lot Of 3 1912 T202's All SGC With Mathewson / Baker / Collins SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: Lot Of 3 1912 T202's All SGC With Mathewson / Baker / Collins SOLD
posts.post_content:
Just back from SGC-they're all graded a 1 because of pinholes but according to SGC's grading standards and the look of these cards, I was hoping for 1.5's and 2's. Anyway, the cards look very nice. SOLD delivered firm-thanks for taking a look. 
Joe
